name: Cook the Book: Ginger Candied Carrots
description: Like a lot of people my age, the Silver Palate Cookbook became my go-to cookbook when I first started cooking for friends and girlfriends. In fact, the first brunch I ever cooked for my wife featured two recipes from the...
recipeIngredient: 12 medium-size carrots, peeled and cut into 1-inch lengths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the carrot pieces in a saucepan and add cold water to cover. Cook the carrots over medium heat until tender, 25 to 30 minutes.
Melt the butter in a small saucepan over low heat. Add the brown sugar, ginger, and caraway seeds. Mix and set aside.
When the carrots are done, drain and return to the pot. Pour the butter mixture over them and cook over low heat, stirring occasionally.
Transfer to a serving dish and serve immediately.
